summary: This is an email chain from August 13, 2019, forwarding a request to reconstruct 292 data for inmate Jeffrey Epstein (register number 76318-054). The email indicates a need to recover or reconstruct specific data related to Epstein while he was incarcerated.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the data reconstruction request, identified by his inmate register number 76318-054.

events.title: Request to reconstruct 292 data for Epstein
events.description: An email is sent forwarding a request to reconstruct 292 data for inmate Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: A request was made on August 13, 2019, to reconstruct '292 data' for inmate Jeffrey Epstein.
The email is a forwarded message, indicating the request passed through at least one intermediary.
